bug.short_desc: gstreamer-plugins-bad-free requires a different libvpx version
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Error: Package: gstreamer-plugins-bad-free-0.10.23-31.fc24.x86_64 (rawhide) Requires: libvpx.so.3()(64bit) You could try using --skip-broken to work around the problem You could try running: rpm -Va --nofiles --nodigest
Please fix if possible!
rawhide!
gstreamer-plugins-bad-free-0.10.23-33.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-c4f53dbd06

gstreamer-plugins-bad-free-0.10.23-33.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-c4f53dbd06
Please note that I reported this issue against *rawhide*. Fixing for the Fedora 25 branch most likely won't fix the issue in rawhide.
It is also built for rawhide.

(In reply to Wim Taymans from comment #4) > It is also built for rawhide.
Thanks!

This bug prevents compose of the ARM Xfce image:
http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=15270522 https://kojipkgs.fedoraproject.org//work/tasks/542/15270542/root.log
DEBUG util.py:421: Unable to create appliance : Failed to build transaction : gstreamer-plugins-bad-free-0.10.23-31.fc24.armv7hl requires libvpx.so.3
That makes it an automatic Alpha blocker: "Bugs which entirely prevent the composition of one or more of the release-blocking images required to be built for a currently-pending (pre-)release" - https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:SOP_blocker_bug_process#Automatic_blockers (the Xfce image is a release-blocking image for ARM). Marking as such.
gstreamer-plugins-bad-free-0.10.23-33.fc25 has been pushed to the Fedora 25 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
